explains: v. （使）稳定，稳固；使不易移动；使稳定，使不易分解
wordGroup: stabilize prices 稳定物价；平抑物价
stabilize the market 稳定市场

sentences.en: It is anticipated that inflation will stabilize at 3%.
sentences.cn: 据预测，通货膨胀将稳定在3%。

sentences.en: Although her illness is serious, her condition is beginning to stabilize.
sentences.cn: 虽然她的病情很严重，但她的情况正开始稳定下来。

sentences.en: The district's enrolment is expected to stabilize in 2006-07 at 10,200 students.
sentences.cn: 本地区的注册入学人数有望在2006至2007年稳定在10200名学生。
